name: Chicken Parmesan Burger
author: Jackie Applegate
summary: This recipe tastes just like a chicken Parm! I was trying to find something that was healthy and tasty and this is it!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine chicken, egg, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon tomato paste, Italian seasoning, garlic powder, and onion powder in a large bowl
Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet
Cook patties until browned, about 4 minutes per side
Cook and stir onion in the drippings left in the skillet until translucent, 3 to 4 minutes
Stir in remaining 2 tablespoons tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, and chicken stock
Cook until thickened and reduced by half, about 5 minutes
Return patties to the skillet; cover with tomato sauce
Place 1 slice of provolone cheese over each patty
Cover skillet and cook until cheese melts slightly, about 1 minute
Place patties on buns; spoon tomato sauce on top
